roleset.name: the act of putting a load on someone (the act!!!)

role.descr: specific aspect of arg0 that is a burden

roles.note: This nominalization differs somewhat from the verb frame. There is not expected to be an agentive burdener here, only a thing that is a burden, and specific aspect of that thing that is particularly a burden, hence the slightly different args. Compare to 'hassle-n.01' instead. Please watch out for instances that describe the load istelf, rather than the experience of heaviness. It can be blurry, but do your best.
